####Example 4.10

####Install packages
```{r, echo = TRUE}
install.packages("MASS")
```
####Normal distribution
```{r, echo = TRUE}
setwd("C:/Book/Chapter4/Examples")
data <-read.csv(file="Ex3.7.csv",head=TRUE,sep=",")

library(MASS)
fit <- fitdistr(data$Temperature, "normal")
class(fit)
para<-fit$estimate
para
hist(data$Temperature,xlab="Temperature")

shapiro.test(data$Temperature)
```
